author: oliverross
title: Connect projects with developers
description: There is a perception its hard to find Cardano developers, this stops projects building on Cardano or migrating from EVM based chains.

author: murdocisgod
title: How did Sony take on Nintendo?!
description: Not being second fiddle to Eth. We need to learn from the the old videogame console wars from the past an make cardano the prime console.

author: maniakugel
title: Carbon ERC-20 Converter to Cardano
description: Many ERC-20 carbon tokens have been rushed to market, locking real world carbon sequestration projects in protocols that may not last.

author: lennext
title: Bring Bored Apes* to Cardano
description: Die-hard Cardano investors have no access to high-value EVM NFTs such as CryptoPunks or BAYC unless using the Ethereum network.

author: brerrabbit3
title: Scaling CNFTs, minus the ETH mess
description: Ethereum's NFT ecosystem is struggling from a lack of trust, but Cardano lacks a scalable way to earn the trust of NFT market participants.

author: newmindflow
title: Attract ETH NFT Projects & Talent
description: How do we get the interest of artists & developers planning to release NFT projects on ETH and onboard them smoothly to Cardano?

author: ben.mesnik
title: Incentivized learning to move users
description: Switching to a new ecosystem is risky and daunting. Farming incentives encourage movement but attract mercenary farmers not actual users.

author: fractalfuzion
title: Eth Rehab - Recovery with Cardano
description: Ethereum users may not understand they need to be rehabilitated. Eth Rehab will serve as a info hub for a smooth transition to Cardano.

author: habacef
title: Bridging NFTs -> remint on Cardano
description: No solution is under development for migrating NFTs (& also fungible tokens) from other chains to Cardano. This need to be done trustworthy.

author: cryptopetz
title: Beacon of Cardano GameFi
description: CNFTs and on-chain gaming are underrepresented at blockchain industry events, leading passionate people in our industry to overlook Cardano.

author: cryptopetz
title: Eth Gas to Fuel the ADA Fire
description: New and established ETH projects have felt the pain of gas costs and a saturated marketplace when launching a new project on Ethereum.

author: nicoarqueros
title: Bridge liquidity for top protocols
description: Most Crypto dApps require liquidity to work correctly. Low liquidity implies jumps in prices, lack of tokens among other undesirable things.

author: nicoarqueros
title: Farming incentive to move liquidity
description: Farming incentives have proven to be very effective in crypto. We can use this to incentivize projects to move liquidity from Ethereum

author: nicoarqueros
title: Milkomeda accelerator batch #2
description: Organic adoption and development of dApps is too slow. Not only that but creating a startup is difficult and it is very likely to fail.

author: lidonation
title: Migrating from ETH: Newcomer Setup
description: There is no landing page to help translate Eth concepts, tech, philosophies, and choices to Cardano's - for users and businesses

author: stephania
title: Project Monarch - GoingUP
description: We are solving problems linked to pseudonymous identity, facilitating collaboration & improving accountability and trustworthiness in web3.

author: shlomocohen
title: Caricature for Migration
description: We are missing some creative ways to reachout to the Ethereum community and onboard them to Cardano

author: adatomsnft
title: ADATOMS HQ Science & DeFi Dec. Ed.
description: Most of the community is lacking the basic scientific, logic and Financial abilities to have a healthy participation in the Cardano network

author: nielstron
title: Imperative Smart Contracts
description: Many programmers are unfamiliar with functional programming languages like Haskell/Plutus. Let's develop an imperative SC language for them!

author: b.ramesh
title: AIDA: Decentralized AI on Cardano
description: Existing works on ETH - Microsoft's DCAI and HP's Swarm Learning frameworks - lack scalability, model security & fair incentive mechanisms

author: cardano4climate
title: The Impact Migration
description: For projects that want to migrate, they need to have information, support and direction by the community for a more efficient onboarding

author: tam.ly
title: NFT marketplace builder platform
description: There hasn't been any NFT marketplace builder platform that integrates Cardano to help launch more Cardano-based NFT projects quickly
